Sentencas: This paper presents operating and performance characteristics of a nine-stack solid-oxide fuel cell combined-heat-and-power system.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: Integrated with a natural-gas fuel processor, air compressor, reactant-gas preheater, and diagnostics and control equipment, the system is designed for use in unconventional oil-and-gas processing.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: Termed a Geothermic Fuel Cell (GFC), the heat liberated by the fuel cell during electricity generation is harnessed to process oil shale into high-quality crude oil and natural gas.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: The 1.5-kW(e) SOFC stacks are packaged within three-stack GFC modules.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: Three GFC modules are mechanically and electrically coupled to a reactant-gas preheater and installed within the earth.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: During operation, significant heat is conducted from the Geothermic Fuel Cell to the surrounding geology.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: The complete system was continuously operated on hydrogen and natural-gas fuels for similar to 600 h. A quasi-steady operating point was established to favor heat generation (29.1 kW(th)) over electricity production (4.4 kW(e)).
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: Thermodynamic analysis reveals a combined-heat-and-power efficiency of 55% at this condition.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: Heat flux to the geology averaged 3.2 kW m(-1) across the 9-m length of the Geothermic Fuel Cell-preheater assembly.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery

Sentencas: System performance is reviewed; some suggestions for improvement are proposed.
Titulo: In-ground operation of Geothermic Fuel Cells for unconventional oil and gas recovery
